sources.title: Watch Me When I Kill (1977) Italian Horror Thriller
sources.description:
Original title: Il gatto dagli occhi di giada
Also known as:  Watch Me When I Kill / The Cat with the Jade Eyes / The Cat's Victims

A pharmacist is murdered, and a woman happens to see the culprit leave the scene. She soon finds herself being stalked by the killer, and when her boyfriend tries to discover who the murderer is and stop him, he begins to find out that there is much more to the murder than the ordinary killing it first appeared to be.

This film is available with original Italian audio, and dubbed English audio.  It also comes subtitled in many languages

Director: Antonio Bido
Writers: Vittorio Schiraldi, Antonio Bido, Roberto Natale
Stars: Corrado Pani, Paola Tedesco, Franco Citti, Fernando Cerulli
Genres: Italian cinema, Giallo, Horror, Mystery, Thriller, War


@CultCinemaClassics
